Author: instantanarchy
Text: >adding an ED hotline was such a fucking slap in the face too. that’s the only thing people ever offer us. go to treatment, go to therapy, call this number blah blah blah but you aren’t allowed to discuss it. and if you can’t recover instantly? you’re doing it for attention and you’re choosing to be sick.   This is huge, seriously. Like its so hard to try and get better all by yourself but no one understands!! friends and family tell you to go to therapy!! therapists tell you to just eat and exercise!!!! So instead all the heavy lifting of actually facing our burdens and the stuff that keeps us locked into this HELL falls on our shoulders, alone, hush-fucking-hush. and people wonder why EDs are so isolating.
